name: SoftSensorApp
description: A Webble that loads a few DigitalDashboard components, connects them, and loads some data. Sets up a visualization environment to show two different modelling methods dealing with sensor failures in a chemical plant with many different sensors. Old version of a demo application for the Hands-on Portal.
keywords: DigitalDashboard,Hands-on Portal,hop,soft sensors,modelling,linear regression,chemical plant,visualization,coordinated views
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
